name: Pocket Monsters Advanced Generation: Minna de Pico Pokémon Waiwai Battle!
summary: Pocket Monsters Advanced Generation: Minna de Pico Pokémon Waiwai Battle! is an education video game based on the third generation of the Pokémon series. It was developed and published by Sega Toys and released for Sega Pico on July 13, 2004 in Japan only.
